CREATE TABLE ${_parameter} ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `material_no` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `material_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `foreign_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `material_type` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, `brand` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `specifications_model` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, `season` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `is_purchase` varchar(1) DEFAULT '是', `is_sell` varchar(1) DEFAULT '否', `is_inventory` varchar(1) DEFAULT '是', `unit_id` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `barcode` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

( #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.materialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.foreignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.specificationsModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.season,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isPurchase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isSell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isInventory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
SELECT m.id, m.material_no materialNo, m.material_name materialName, m.foreign_name foreignName, m.material_type materialType, m.brand, m.specifications_model specificationsModel, m.season, m.is_purchase isPurchase, m.is_sell isSell, m.is_inventory isInvertory, m.unit_id unitId, m.barcode FROM ${tableName} m
limit #{startNo},#{pageSize}

select count(m.id) from ${tableName} m
where m.material_name like CONCAT ('%', #{keyword},'%')
select id from material_type where type_name = #{_parameter} limit 1
select distinct type_name value from material_type
select id from material_unit where unit_name = #{_parameter} limit 1
select distinct unit_name value from material_unit
